name: Participation
title: participation
description: HL7-defined code system of concepts that represent functional involvement of a caregiver or member of a care team with an activity being transmitted (e.g., Case Manager, Evaluator, Transcriber, Nurse Care Practitioner, Midwife, Physician Assistant, etc.).  Used in HL7 Version 2.x messaging in the PRT segment.

concepts.definition: Person that cosigned the prescription
The specific Health Professional who has been approved to perform the ordered services for the patient.
The Provider Organization that has been approved to perform the sanctioned procedures to which the patient was referred to.
Identifies the entity responsible for initiating the event
The organization that is responsible for collecting the specimen.
Organization, person or device that has the authority to remove a specimen identifier.
The Assistant Result Interpreter who is expected to interpret the result (in the future).
Identifies the device that was used to enter the order into the system.
Identifies the organization that entered the order into the system.
Identifies the person that entered the order into the system
The Principal Result Interpreter who is expected to interpret the result (in the future).
Describes the location (coordinates) of the specimen/container in the previous holder / storage equipment before the move or the geographical location from which the specimen/container was moved.
The facility from where the order was placed
The organization the ordering provider is associated with.

concepts.display: Outside Site(s) Where Observation May Be Performed

concepts.definition: Identifies the person taking responsibility for the prescription dispense
Pharmacy the patient would prefer to use for any future medication orders.
Identifies the person responsible for interpreting the results of the study/test
The Health Professional who refers the patient.
Organization, person or device that has the authority to assign a specimen identifier.
The Provider Organization that refers the patient.
The person that collected the specimen.
Describes the location (coordinates) of the specimen/container in the previous holder / storage equipment after the move or the geographical location to which the specimen/container was moved.
Identifies the person verifying the dispense / a step in the dispense process / verifying the treatment corresponds to the order

concepts.display: Verifying Pharmaceutical Supplier   (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)
Verifying Treatment Supplier   (not sure how to dissect Pharmacist/Treatment Supplier's Verifier ID)
